title: Why this is the one mascara every woman over 40 should own
text:
Mascara is my most treasured make-up staple. In fact, going without it is a little like leaving the house without any knickers. As in: I just wouldn’t.

An eye-opening miracle, you won’t be surprised to learn that mascara is the make-up product most women ask me to recommend – yet it’s almost impossible to accurately prescribe as it’s so personal.

I like big, fat, long lashes. The bolder, the better. Yet to some, that would be as brazen as over-the-knee stiletto boots.

Women’s eyelashes also vary in length, thickness and curl. But I think I’ve finally landed on a universally flattering lash enhancer. Westman Atelier’s Eye Love You Mascara is the one that I’d recommend to any woman, any age, no...
description: Mascara is my most treasured make-up staple.
